sqlGroup.name: deviceStatus
sqlGroup.sql: SELECT mci.`car_no`, mds.`car_status`, mds.`exhaust_status`, md.`name` -- @where FROM mo_device_status mds INNER JOIN mo_car_info mci ON mci.device_id = mds.device_id INNER JOIN mo_driver md ON md.id = mci.driver_id -- @condition WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY mds.`report_time` desc
